review: Updated 2/25/15 - Although I have always been pleased with the concept and interface of the Fire TV Stick, I did experience continual "hangs" with the device at first. After writing my initial review, I was contacted by Amazon and given direction to where I might find the answers. And, as is true of Amazon and their customer service for me, the answers were there and after following the instructions the Stick is working very well now. NO MORE HANGS in video playback!
